channel.title: CVE Feed for Progress Software Corporation -- MOVEit Transfer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Progress Software Corporation -- MOVEit Transfer

item.title: CVE-2024-0396|2024-01-17T15:58:24.651Z -- Progress Software Corporation -- MOVEit Transfer
item.description: In Progress MOVEit Transfer versions released before 2022.0.10 (14.0.10), 2022.1.11 (14.1.11), 2023.0.8 (15.0.8), 2023.1.3 (15.1.3), an input validation issue was discovered. An authenticated user can manipulate a parameter in an HTTPS transaction. The modified transaction could lead to computational errors within MOVEit Transfer and potentially result in a denial of service.
